name: Maria Renata Saenger von Mossau
description:
One of the last to be executed for witchcraft in Germany; beheaded followed by burning, June 1749

Renata confessed to a Benedictine confessor that she was a Satanist and  witch; that in 1687, at the age of seven, she had sworn herself to Satan and, at twelve, had become a prostitute and learned magic and to mix poisons 

In 1694, Maria was baptized at a black mass, and in 1699, was inducted in the convent of Unter-Zell in Bavaria; it was claimed she entered entirely to make strife amongst the "brides of Christ" 

Maria claimed to be a skilled chemist and preferred the strong poison Aqua Tofana developed by Giulia Tofana in Naples 

She said she was remorseful, but the church still judged her guilty of sorcery, heresy, witchcraft, apostasy, and Satanism 

Maria was then turned over to the secular authorities to be executed

One of a series working with AI to give face to women executed as witches; these form part of a broader collection of Horror Portraits at www.horrorportraits.xyz

#WitchingHourOnHEN 

Can be used as #PFP and #wallpaper

PNG 4800 x 4800
